alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson, northwestern Taylor and southwestern Madison Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles south of Monticello to near St. Marks. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, St. Marks, Newport, Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre, Iddo, Hyde Park, Eridu, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Plum Orchard, Scanlon, Econfina, Lake Bird, Port Leon, Fanlew, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs and Shady Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Madison
